data.caption: Corporate Action-Board approves Dividend

data.news_body:
Adf Foods Ltd-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 07/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve 1. the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Half Year ended 30th September 2025. 
2. the declaration of Interim Dividend on the Equity Shares of the Company for the Financial Year 2025-26.
